footer.about: The inter-university committee is the university branch of the Moustarchidines Juniors of Dahiratoul Moustarchidina Wal Moustarchidaty. It brings together Moustarchidine students from public universities, schools and training institutes in Senegal.

guide.title: Orientation Guide
guide.description: Essential steps to join the Moustarchidine university community

step1.title: Choose your University
step1.description: Browse the carousel above to find your university and discover the orientation poster.

step2.title: Contact the Council
step2.description: Call the provided numbers directly to get in touch with your university's council.

step3.title: Join the Community
step3.description: Participate in activities and events organized by your university's Moustarchidine council.

q1.question: Who can join the CIU?
q1.answer: All Moustarchidine students from partner universities can join the Inter-University Committee.

q2.question: How to participate in events?
q2.answer: Once registered with your university council, you will receive all information about upcoming events.
